Text.Value: Compressed Data
It’s a mysterious data that,was buried in Genso Area.
Looks like we need to ask an,expert to check what’s inside.
Heat Data
A copy of the HeatExhaust,data. It can melt cyber ice!,(#v@20# charges left)
A chemical made by Mari,that melts snow and ice.,I wonder what’s in it.
Metro Pass
With this，we can ride the,Linear Metro for free!
Ice Crystal Data
It’s pretty ice crystal data!,Just looking at it makes me,feel better.
Package Data
It’s a pack of data that our,client wants delivered.,Looks like some Sub Chips.
Mari P-Code
The P-Code to Mari’s HP.,It unlocks Mari’s P-Cube.
Remilia P-Code
The P-Code to Remilia’s HP.,It unlocks Remilia’s P-Cube.
Rika P-Code
The P-Code to Rika’s HP.,It unlocks Rika’s P-Cube.
Tsubaki P-Code
The P-Code to Tsubaki’s HP.,It unlocks Tsubaki’s P-Cube.
Tenshi P-Code
The P-Code to Tenshi’s HP.,It unlocks Tenshi’s P-Cube.
Old Chip Data
It’s an old data chip found,in the park’s sandbox.,I wonder what’s inside.
Teacher ID
It’s Ms. Koa’s ID card.,We can use it to access,the school’s network.
Cruise Ticket
The N1 League prize was a,ticket for a cruise to Engelles,on a luxury cruise liner!
Yin Key
This black key can open,the Shrine Comp gates!,Works with a YangKey.
Yang Key
This white key can open,the Shrine Comp gates!,Works with a YinKey.
Admin P-Code
A P-Code to the “Friend Link“,admin area.
Small Parcel
A small parcel that our,client gave us. We need,to deliver it quickly.
Wriggle’s Pendant
Translucent amber on,a beautiful necklace
There's something stuck,in the amber...,I can barely see it.
ROM ID
Can be used to open,skull doors across,the Net.
Preserved Flowers
Flowers that underwent,a special process.,They smell nice.
Old Key Data
Key data that opens,a door in a ship's comp.,It looks fragile.
Old ID Data
ID data that opens,a door in a ship's comp.,It looks fragile.
Old Passcode
A passcode that opens,a door in a ship's comp.,It looks fragile.
Reincarnation Program
Allows a sprite to be,reborn as a Net Navi.,A special program.
